channel.title: Reuben Rapose
channel.description: Reuben is a Data Scientist by training and Full-Stack Developer by passion. In his early teens, while pursuing his obsession with technology, he discovered a passion for building tech that makes a difference – Today, Reuben works as an independent Consultant, get in touch. ✌︎

item.title: Startup Founders, Would You Rather Have A 10x Better Product Or 10x Better Distribution?
item.description: Should you focus on product or distribution. A product is a thing that you create and people use, whereas a distribution strategy is a how you reach your audience.
item.author: reuben.rapose@gmail.com (Reuben Rapose)

item.title: Life-Changing Lessons I've Learnt As An Entrepreneur

item.author: reuben.rapose@gmail.com (Reuben Rapose)

item.title: Web3 : A Marketing Buzzword Far Away From Reality
item.description: I was recently introduced to Web3, a new technology that is being used by many companies to build their own Blockchain.
item.author: reuben.rapose@gmail.com (Reuben Rapose)

item.title: Programming is Easy, Software Development is Hard & Maintaining Code is the Hardest
item.description: When you are a programmer, you need to be able to do what you can do, and when you are a software developer, you need to be able to do what you can't do.
item.author: reuben.rapose@gmail.com (Reuben Rapose)

item.title: Stop Validating Your Business Ideas
item.description: I recently got into the startup world and I was wondering if I should be validating my business ideas.

item.title: 4 Major Misconceptions about the Word ‘Passion’ & How to Find Yours
item.description: If you ca n let go of passion and follow your curiosity, your curiosity just might lead you to your passion
